title: Milkit1990
author: Milkit1990
content: TERMS OF ENGAGEMENT: PROCEDURES IS NON-NEGOTIABLESATOSHI TERMS: UPFONT CIS & POF, MINIMUM ORDER 500 BTC VIA L2L OR 500K USDT W2W.BTC QUANTITY TO DISCOUNT RATIO:50K TO 100K 6/3100K TO 500K 7/4500K TO 1M 8/5USDT QUANTITY TO DISCOUNT RATIO:1B TO 2B 6/32B TO 10B 7/410B TO 20B 8/5MAX DISCOUNT RATIO: 8/4COMMISSION BREAKDOWN:SELLER SIDE (1.5% OPEN )BUYER SIDE (1.5% OPEN)SELLER: 8/4  MAX - WITH SATOSHI TERMS  L2L BANKS:WELLS FARGO | CITIBANK | CHASE| BOA | SIGNATURE BANK | CANADA BANK |BORDIE CIE (ZURICH) | HK BANK | DUBAI BANKS (NBD, EIB, CDB AND FAB ETC)SELLER’S FIAT/BTC L2L PROCEDURES (NO 1):1. BUYER AND SELLER SIGN AGREEMENT AND IMFPA (BUYER PROVIDE CURRENT STATEMENT ACCOUNT, SELLER PROVIDER WALLET SCREEN SHOT, MINIMUM OF 5.000 BTC)2. BUYER AND SELLER SHOW POF/POC3. BUYER PAY FOR THE FIRST TRANCHE 200 BTC TO THE SELLER NOMINATED BANK ACCOUNT4. SELLER CONFIRM FUND AND SIMULTANEOUSLY CREDIT COIN 200 BTC TO BUYER WALLET ADDRESS5. SELLER PAY TO HIS BROKERS AND DISCOUNT BY BTC/FIAT.6. NEXT TRANCHE CONTINUE UNTIL CONTRACT EXHAUSTEDNote: 1. Satoshi will not be given to US residents 2. Acceptable POF is a certified bank statement that can be verified for satoshi

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Does this "I sell a million Bitcoins for 20 billion dollars" scam still work? Do people send you enough money so you can eat again for a week?
